column2: Formulate an ontology related to library. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/library#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .:Library rdf:type owl:Class ;         rdfs:label "Library" ;         rdfs:comment "A place where books and other materials are available for people to use or borrow." .:Book rdf:type owl:Class ;      rdfs:label "Book" ;      rdfs:comment "A written or printed work consisting of pages glued or sewn together along one side and bound in covers." .:Member rdf:type owl:Class ;        rdfs:label "Member" ;        rdfs:comment "An individual who has registered with the library to borrow materials and access services." .:Librarian rdf:type owl:Class ;           rdfs:label "Librarian" ;           rdfs:comment "A person who works professionally in a library, providing access to information and sometimes social or technical programming." .:Loan rdf:type owl:Class ;      rdfs:label "Loan" ;      rdfs:comment "An arrangement where a library member is temporarily allowed to take a book or resource from the library." .:hasMember rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;           rdfs:domain :Library ;           rdfs:range :Member ;           rdfs:label "has member" ;           rdfs:comment "Associates a library with its registered member(s)." .:hasBook rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;         rdfs:domain :Library ;         rdfs:range :Book ;         rdfs:label "has book" ;         rdfs:comment "Associates a library with the books it possesses." .:borrowedBy rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;            rdfs:domain :Loan ;            rdfs:range :Member ;            rdfs:label "borrowed by" ;            rdfs:comment "Associates a loan with the library member who borrowed the book." .:bookLoaned rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;            rdfs:domain :Loan ;            rdfs:range :Book ;            rdfs:label "book loaned" ;            rdfs:comment "Associates a loan with the book that has been borrowed." .:managedBy rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;           rdfs:domain :Library ;           rdfs:range :Librarian ;           rdfs:label "managed by" ;           rdfs:comment "Associates a library with its librarian(s) who manage it." .:isAvailable rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;             rdfs:domain :Book ;             rdfs:range rdf:Literal ;             rdfs:label "is available" ;             rdfs:comment "Indicates if a book is currently available for borrowing." .```

column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: library. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/library#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .:Library rdf:type owl:Class .:Book rdf:type owl:Class .:Journal rdf:type owl:Class .:Member rdf:type owl:Class .:Author rdf:type owl:Class .:Librarian rdf:type owl:Class .:hasMember rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Library ;    rdfs:range :Member .:hasBook rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Library ;    rdfs:range :Book .:hasJournal rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Library ;    rdfs:range :Journal .:writtenBy rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Book ;    rdfs:range :Author .:checkedOutBy rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Book ;    rdfs:range :Member .:manages rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Librarian ;    rdfs:range :Library .:hasTitle rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Book ;    rdfs:range rdfs:Literal .:hasISBN rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Book ;    rdfs:range rdfs:Literal .:hasPublicationDate rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Book ;    rdfs:range rdfs:Literal .:hasName rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Member ;    rdfs:range rdfs:Literal .:hasMembershipID rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Member ;    rdfs:range rdfs:Literal .:Library rdfs:label "Library" .:Book rdfs:label "Book" .:Journal rdfs:label "Journal" .:Member rdfs:label "Member" .:Author rdfs:label "Author" .:Librarian rdfs:label "Librarian" .:hasMember rdfs:label "has member" .:hasBook rdfs:label "has book" .:hasJournal rdfs:label "has journal" .:writtenBy rdfs:label "written by" .:checkedOutBy rdfs:label "checked out by" .:manages rdfs:label "manages" .:hasTitle rdfs:label "has title" .:hasISBN rdfs:label "has ISBN" .:hasPublicationDate rdfs:label "has publication date" .:hasName rdfs:label "has name" .:hasMembershipID rdfs:label "has membership ID" .```

column2: Design an ontology to encompass the following: library.   Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/library#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Library rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Library" ;    rdfs:comment "A collection of resources such as books and media" .:Resource rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Resource" ;    rdfs:comment "A resource in a library, such as a book or magazine" .:Book rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Book" ;    rdfs:comment "A book resource in the library" ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Resource .:Magazine rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Magazine" ;    rdfs:comment "A magazine resource in the library" ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Resource .:Media rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Media" ;    rdfs:comment "Media resources such as CDs or DVDs" ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Resource .:Author rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Author" ;    rdfs:comment "An author of a resource" .:Title rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:label "Title" ;    rdfs:domain :Resource ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .:hasAuthor rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "has author" ;    rdfs:domain :Resource ;    rdfs:range :Author .:publishedDate rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:label "Published Date" ;    rdfs:domain :Resource ;    rdfs:range xsd:date .:isAvailable rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:label "Is Available" ;    rdfs:domain :Resource ;    rdfs:range xsd:boolean .:Borrows rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "borrows" ;    rdfs:domain :Patron ;    rdfs:range :Resource .:Patron rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Patron" ;    rdfs:comment "A person who borrows resources from the library" .:address rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:label "Address" ;    rdfs:domain :Patron ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .:LibraryBranch rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Library Branch" ;    rdfs:comment "A branch of the library" .:locatedAt rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "Located At" ;    rdfs:domain :Resource ;    rdfs:range :LibraryBranch .```
